name: Lemonade, LemonAid
description:
You are a lemon that has the goal to turn itself into lemonade. 

You must find the juicers at the end of each stage while collecting as much sugar as possible to increase the lemonade's sweetness and increase your overall score.

There are 10 levels to complete with varying enemies, who will threaten your sweetness along the journey.

Turn every lemon into lemonade to win.
